alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Morgan, Johnson, central Magoffin and southeastern Elliott Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Keaton to Win to Seiltz. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elna, Win, Ophir, Keaton, Minefork, Relief, Hargis, Mima, Gillem Branch and Moon around 615 PM EDT. Flatgap, Barnrock and Redbush around 620 PM EDT. Winifred, Sip, Kerz, Mashfork, Cyrus and Ivyton around 625 PM EDT. Ballot, Conley, Chandlerville, Niles, Wheelersburg and Riceville around 630 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Oil Springs, Patrick, Leander, Swamp Branch, Dobson, Chestnut, Barnetts Creek, Staffordsville, Fitz, Denver, Collista, East Point, Paintsville, Wittensville, Thealka, Nippa, Tutor Key, Thelma, Stambaugh, Woodland Estates, Galen and Perston Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
